full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DBYANGS CAN DGYES GLU'I MCHAN 'GREL SNYAN NGAG KUN GYI 'JUG SGO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @026A *, ,(BLA MA'I GNAS SKABS NI BLA MA'I BKA'I GNAS SKABS, ,KUN GZIGS LNGA PAS MDZAD PA'I DBYANGS CAN DGYES GLU'I BRJOD BYED TSIG GI LUNG TZAM GYI BRGYUD PA YOD KYANG BRJOD BYA DON GYI RGYUD PA RGYUN CHAD PAS YID GTING NAS SKYO STE SGO SNA TSOGS NAS THABS GTUGS NAS DANG, SNYAN NGAG GIS BON TZAM TSUGS NA CIM RUNG SNYAM DU SMON PA'I YID KYIS BSKUL TE BKA' BCU BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS BRIS PA'O,, ,,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,@026B AOm SVA STI, ,BOD YUL AA MDO'I MKHAS RNAMS KYANG, ,'GREL PA MA BRTZOMS LUS PA YI, ,SHIN TU RTOGS DKA'I GNAS 'DI LA, ,'GREL PA BRTZOMS PA NGO MTSAR RO, ,BSTAN PA RDZOGS LDAN NYIN DUS SU, ,MA BYUNG MTHA' 'KHOB MTSAN MO RU, ,NGO MTSAR NYI MA 'DI SHAR PAS, ,MKHAS KUN DGA' BA'I ME TOG RGYAS, ,PAR BSKRUN RNAM DKAR DGE TSOGS MTHUS, ,BSTAN 'DZIN DAM PA ZHABS PAD BRTAN, ,BSTAN PA'I 'GAL RKYEN KUN ZHI NAS, ,BSTAN PA YUN RING GNAS GYUR CIG , ,,(CES PA 'DI NI PAndI TA'I BTAGS MING GIS SGRO 'DOGS PA BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN NYI MAS BRIS PA'O, ,HAL KHA CHING SU TZUG THU'I KHU RI DGE LDAN BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA RGYAS PA'I GLING DU PAR DU BSGRUBS SO,, ,,)
